column4: can anyone help? I can't get a script to execute after starting wvdial
you mean if you start wvdial in a terminal, you can't run a script in the same terminal?
no I put a script in /etc/ppp/ip-up.d/ and read that any script in there executes
ah, I've never used wvdial and expected that to happen. I've always used pppconfig so don't have any usable insight
